explains: n. 柠檬；柠檬汁；柠檬色；柠檬树（=lemon tree）；<非正式>蹩脚的人（或物）
wordGroup: lemon tea 柠檬茶，柠檬果茶

sentences.en: I plucked a lemon from the tree.
sentences.cn: 我从树上摘下一枚柠檬。

sentences.en: His favourite tipple was rum and lemon.
sentences.cn: 他最爱喝的饮料是朗姆酒加柠檬汁。

sentences.en: Grilled trout needs only a squeeze of lemon.
sentences.cn: 烤鳟鱼只需要一点柠檬榨汁。
